event.title: FSFE-booth, presentation and book reading at LocHal Open Source Event in Tilburg, Netherlands

body.p: On Saturday November 23 we will host a FSFE-booth at the Open Source Event in LocHal public library in Tilburg the Netherlands. We will combine this with a presentation about the FSFE and an Ada & Zangemann book reading. We are looking forward to have a chat with you about Free Software!
